about.name: Matthew Murno
about.title: Computer Science major at Boston College

personalProjects.title: Resume website with some react integration
personalProjects.source: Web Page Created by Matthew Murno
personalProjects.description: This is a project that I had started a while ago on my Linux virtual machine. I wanted to learn how to code Javascript and React, however I didn't spend enough time learning the basics, and my lack of project experience led me to fall short of finishing. I hope that with the skills I learn in Web Application Development, I could finish this project, and make the webpage I was picturing instead of what it turned out to be.

personalProjects.title: Animated loading screens for twitch.tv streams
personalProjects.description: To complete this project I needed to learn how to use Adobe After Affects. I learned how to animate typing on a screen, as well as animate different transitions. I learned a lot about myself and my creativy by working on this project

classProjects.title: Political Ad Project
classProjects.description: This project was inspired by Marvel Comics, and I used my creativy to create an interesting advertisment to promote climate reform using the skills I had learned in my Intro to Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator class last semester. I believe I had a good grasp over these skills
